p: SH-SY5Y cells were seeded in 96 well format, differentiated and infected with SFV-GFP in culture media containing the indicated dilutions of inhibitors (MOI 3). 8 h later cells were washed and fixed in 4% formaldehyde, and the nuclei stained with Hoechst (5 Î¼g/ml ThermoFisher Scientific). Images were acquired using an Opera high-content spinning-disk confocal microscope (PerkinElmer) and the percentage of infected cells quantified using the Columbus Image Data Management and Analysis Software (PerkinElmer).
